title: Learning Systems Engineering Design for Online Information Technology Diploma Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational understanding of information technology
context.additional_context: Systematic online course design using instructional systems engineering approaches, emphasizing technology-driven learning solution development.

learning_goals: Learners can implement an information technology curriculum design process by applying instructional systems engineering methodologies
Learners can complete practical task-based assignments using collaboration tools in a project-based learning environment
Learners can evaluate and improve effective online learning systems under technical constraints
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
